snippet: As unlimited data plans fade away, services and applications are being designed to help users manage their consumption.
abstract: Several companies are introducing mobile phone applications that help users manage and understand their data usage, as cellphone carriers replace unlimited data with more limited plans; apps point out instances of heavy data usage such as video and image sites, helping users tweak their habits to avoid extra charges.
lead_paragraph: As unlimited data plans fade away, services and applications are being designed to help users manage their consumption.

headline.seo: New Apps Seek to Help Phone Users Track Data Use
